revised_title: Cytoplasmic Organelle Abnormalities in Chlamydomonas reinhardii Mutants
tldr: This study examines flagella-less, stumpy, and short flagellum mutants of Chlamydomonas reinhardii, revealing abnormalities in the structure and assembly of cytoplasmic organelles. The research suggests that these mutations may be caused by chromosomal gene abnormalities and could have implications for understanding cellular development and function.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Genetics and Development
